string-array.name: faq_questions
string-array.item: Why I need a VPN?
Is it safe?
How to use Liberty VPN?
How to disconnect Liberty VPN?
Can\’t connect, not stable or speed is slow.
How to switch server location?
Can\’t find the server you want?
Why can\'t I use Internet after connection established?
How to disable battery optimization for Liberty VPN?
How to cancel the subscription in Google play?
Can I get refund?

string-array.name: faq_answers
string-array.item: VPN is virtual private network. It allows you to stay private, stay secure, and access any online blocked content you want, no matter where you from.

We use SSL to encrypt your internet data. Your data is undecipherable to prying eyes while in route. Moreover, we do not collect, log, store, share any data log belonging to users, and please feel safe to use our product.
Click the \"Start\" button on the middle place of the home page. Then please “Trust this application” if your device asks for this permission.
Click the same connect button on the home page to disconnect from VPN server.

Connection problem is affected by many factors, please update to the latest version, refresh the server list and connect to the top server for few times. If it still does not work for you, please contact us via libertyapps.studio@gmail.com and provide us with your country and network provider name.
Choose the location you want in the server list, then VPN will connect to the location you click.
Please contact and provide us the detail website address that you want to unblock via libertyapps.studio@gmail.com We will collect your feedback and improve our product.
First of all, check your network connection. Then make sure you\'ve disable battery optimization for Liberty VPN in android\'s battery settings.

In most Android devices, Open Settings > Battery > Battery Optimization > Select all apps in drop down menu. Find Liberty VPN and set it "Don\'t optimize".In Huawei devices, Open Setting > Battery > Launch, Find Liberty VPN in the apps list,switch off to "Manage manually", enable "Auto Lunch" and "Run in background". Or you can find battery setting in "Protected Apps".In Samsung devices, Open settings > Battery > App Power Saving > Details, find Liberty VPN in the apps list and disable it.In other devices, you may find it in Setting > Battery > as "Background activity" or "Protected Apps"

Subscriptions on Google Play renew automatically unless you unsubscribe, if you want to unsubscribe, please open Google Play Store, tap Menu-Subscriptions-Tap thesubscription you want to cancel-Tap Cancel subscription. Check the details here: https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/2476088
Not cancelling your subscription before the trial period ends will not be refunded. Check the details here: https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/2476088

VPNFree collects a minimal amount of data to offer you a fast and reliable VPN service.

We collect:
 
We do not store or log your IP address after you disconnect from the VPN.
 
Aggregated anonymous website activity data, to perform analytics on our service to ensure you can reliably access certain websites or apps. 
 
Total bandwidth consumed and time connected to our VPN service. 
 
We do not keep logs of your online activities and never associate any domains or applications that you use with you, your device, IP address.
We do not keep logs of your online activies and never associate any domains or applications that you use with you, your device, IP address, or email.
We do not keep logs of your online activies and never associate any domains or applications that you use with you, your device, IP address, or email.
